subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The reason C.C. Sabathia has not accepted a six-year, $140 million contract offer from the Yankees, say those who know him, is that his first choice is not New York.
snippet: The reason C.C. Sabathia has not accepted a six-year, $140 million contract offer from the Yankees, say those who know him, is that his first choice is not New York.
